pages.title: Description
pages.text: Temperature is just as important as diet, but in these extremely cold conditions you just need to focus on staying warm.

pages.title: Campfire
pages.text: $(6) Campfire $() was mentioned earlier, it provides a small amount of warmth and is good for warming up outside at night. $(br2) But you have to be careful when others find you, sitting by the campfire in the dark is no different from a live target.

pages.title: Heater
pages.text: $(6) Heater $() is the best heating device, it can provide unlimited warmth, but note that it is only effective when indoors, not recommended to carry it outside. $(br2)$(3) Give it a redstone signal to turn on the heating mode.

pages.title: Wotton Clothing
pages.text: The $(6) wool suit $() will provide you with better warmth, though it is less durable and not as effective as the $(6) thermal liner $(), but you must wear this suit when out exploring in pre-development $(br2) In addition, the suits of other mods may provide some warmth $(4) (note that it is possible).

pages.title: Warm Liner
pages.text: $(6) Warm Liner $() is the most advanced heating set that can be combined with $(6) armors $() to provide you with warmth by wearing it. $(br2)$(4) Note that it cannot be combined with $(6) wool suit $().

pages.title: Goopak Heat
pages.text: The $(6) Goopak Heat $() provides a time-limited warming effect after the $(2) right click $() has been used, which is best used if you do not have the $(6) warming clothes$().
